tool_description: Analyzes the authenticity of provenance documents including certificates, invoices, insurance records, and correspondence to detect forgeries or inconsistencies.

document_type.description: Type of document being analyzed (certificate, invoice, letter, insurance, exhibition_catalog, etc.)

issuing_authority.description: Organization or person who issued the document

physical_characteristics.description: Observable physical characteristics (paper type, ink, stamps, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid document type: Document type must be one of [certificate, invoice, letter, insurance, exhibition_catalog, customs, legal, other].
Invalid date format: Document date must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Missing issuing authority: Issuing authority cannot be empty.
Unsupported language: Specified language is not supported for authenticity analysis.
usage: Provide details about a provenance document for authenticity analysis. The tool examines historical context, format consistency, and known characteristics of authentic documents from the stated source and time period.

historical_consistency.description: Whether document format matches historical standards
